title: Replace Client and Pricing sections with Elite Client Profiles and AI Performance Intelligence

requirements.text: Remove the entire TestimonialsSection component and all its references from App.tsx, including the import statement and the component render call

quotes: Completely remove the full "Client" section. Remove all associated: Headings, Logos, Testimonials (if inside that section), Containers, Background elements

acceptanceCriteria: TestimonialsSection component is no longer imported or rendered in App.tsx
No empty gaps or broken spacing remains after removal
Smooth scroll flow is maintained between adjacent sections

requirements.text: Create a new EliteClientProfilesSection component with section title 'Elite Client Profiles', featuring 3 premium profile cards in a horizontal layout on desktop and stacked on mobile. Each card must include: circular professional profile picture, full name, position, company type (e.g., FinTech, SaaS, Enterprise AI), and 2-3 line testimonial. Apply subtle neon border glow, glassmorphism or soft gradient dark card background, smooth hover animation with lift and glow increase effects, and maintain clean spacing and equal alignment across all cards

quotes: Create a new premium section in place of the removed client section. Section Title: Elite Client Profiles

acceptanceCriteria: Section displays 3 profile cards horizontally on desktop
Cards stack vertically on mobile devices
Each card contains all required elements: circular photo, name, position, company type, testimonial
Cards have neon border glow matching the existing cyan neon theme
Hover animations include lift effect and increased glow intensity
Glassmorphism or gradient dark background is applied to cards
Professional, executive-level visual style is maintained

requirements.text: Remove the entire PricingSection component and all its references from App.tsx, including the import statement and the component render call. Ensure no layout shift occurs and spacing consistency is maintained

quotes: Remove the full Pricing section. Delete all pricing cards, toggles, buttons, and scripts. Maintain spacing consistency. No layout shift.

acceptanceCriteria: PricingSection component is no longer imported or rendered in App.tsx
No pricing cards, toggles, or buttons remain
Adjacent sections maintain proper spacing
No visual layout shift occurs after removal

requirements.text: Create a new AIPerformanceSection component with heading 'AI-Driven Performance Intelligence' and subtitle 'Real-time automation metrics powered by intelligent systems.' Implement a 2-column grid layout on desktop (stacked on mobile) displaying 4 animated metric counters with neon highlight accents and supporting labels: 'Workflow Automation Rate: 87% Tasks Automated', 'Operational Processing Speed: 6.4x Faster Execution', 'AI Decision Accuracy: 98.7% Model Precision', 'Manual Intervention Reduced: -72% Human Dependency'. Counters must animate upward smoothly on scroll with fade and count effects using the existing useCounterAnimation hook

quotes: Create a powerful performance metrics section replacing Pricing. Section Heading: AI-Driven Performance Intelligence
Counters should animate upward smoothly on scroll (fade + count effect).

acceptanceCriteria: Section displays heading and subtitle as specified
4 metrics are displayed in a 2-column grid on desktop
Metrics stack vertically on mobile devices
Each metric shows large animated number with neon accent and label underneath
Counter animation triggers on scroll using existing animation patterns
All metric values and labels match the exact specifications provided

requirements.text: Add an authority testimonial block within the AIPerformanceSection component, positioned below the metrics grid. Display the quote: 'SwiftOps AI automation reduced operational delays by 43% within 90 days.' with attribution '— Operations Director, FinTech Company'. Apply center alignment, slight italic styling, soft neon glow accent line, and maintain professional corporate tone matching the existing design system

quotes: Below metrics, add a premium quote block: "SwiftOps AI automation reduced operational delays by 43% within 90 days." — Operations Director, FinTech Company

acceptanceCriteria: Testimonial block appears below the metrics grid
Quote and attribution text match exactly as specified

quotes: Add a high-quality futuristic "Connected Workflow" visual. Theme: glowing network nodes, automation pipelines, AI data flow. Add subtle animation: Flowing light lines, Pulse nodes, Soft moving gradient
